app.name: hdltools
app.author: Nicolas Ruiz Requejo
app.summary: This a collection of utilities to generate component instantiation and testbench templates files for VHDL sources mainly

proc.name: gui_run-vhdl_get_instantiation_template
proc.summary: Launch the process to obtain VHDL instantiation template from a source file in the current project opened in GUI

proc.name: gui_run-vhdl_get_testbench_template
proc.summary: Launch the process to obtain VHDL testbench templates from a source file in the current project opened in GUI

proc.name: vhdl_get_template
proc.summary: Generates VHDL instantiation or testbench templates
